land.title: Sky Ring
land.description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a bird's-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

land.title: Recoil
land.description: India's first-ever action-packed reverse looping roller coaster ride!

land.title: Mission Interstellar
land.description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

land.title: Equinox
land.description: A thrill monster that flips you 360 degrees in a giant spinning wheel!

land.title: Flash Tower
land.description: Experience the ultimate adrenaline rush as you plummet from great heights!

land.title: Maverick
land.description: Dare to ride the most challenging roller coaster in South India!

water.title: Hurricane
water.description: Get swept away by the massive waves in this thrilling water ride!

water.title: Rain Disco
water.description: Dance in the rain with pulsating music and colorful lights!

water.title: Wave Pool
water.description: Surf artificial waves in India's largest wave pool experience!

water.title: Aqua Dance
water.description: Splash into fun with this interactive water playground!

kids.title: Mini Train
kids.description: A delightful train ride perfect for young adventurers!

kids.title: Kiddie Carousel
kids.description: Classic merry-go-round fun for the little ones!

kids.title: Bumper Cars
kids.description: Safe and fun bumper car experience designed for kids!
